title: Silver Border?
body: So, I'm Silver V trash even though LolSumo grades my perfromances as either Gold or Platnium so I don't what to base it off of, but I noticed I don't have a silver border like my other silver friends. I'm assuming this is due to the fact you might need Silver 3, 2, or 1?

replies.body: DanKBluR's info is accurate!  Traditionally, the borders are rewards from the previous season.  If this season will be anything like the last, then your border starting in the next season will be whatever you end at in this current one.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Borders are rewarded to players at the end of each season for Silver, Gold, Platinum, etc. If you were bronze or unranked in season 6 that is the reason you don't have one, and your friends were silver in season 6.
